author: Matt Horne
title: Proton Pass takes on Google Wallet with an extra privacy twist
description: Proton Pass now lets you securely store more than passwords, with full end-to-end encryption across custom data, IDs, and even pet info.
content:
• Proton Pass now supports storing more than just passwords, including medical records and passport numbers.
  • You can create fully custom entries or use 14 new templates, with file attac… [+2081 chars]
